item.title: Debian Squeeze 64 Vagrant Base Box
item.description: Lately I needed to test a project under Debian Squeeze 64 bit. I found several 32 bit boxes but no 64 bits. So I decided to build one of my own. Quickstart To get up and running you just need to: gem install vagrant vagrant box add squeeze64 http://dl.dropbox.com/u/937870/VMs/squeeze64.box vagrant init squeeze64 vagrant up Details The base box has the following characteristics: 275Mb in it’s packaged form; 8Gb hard drive; Debian Squeeze with a linux-image-2.
